title: Spanish Translation
guest_stars: Susan Powter, Kevin Meaney, The Bee Gees
synopsis: After declaring his fondness for Mexican food, Space Ghost asks diet guru Susan Powter what super powers help "stop the insanity." Comedian Kevin Meaney discusses the virtues of wearing tight pants and the Bee Gees stop by for a short, bizarre visit.

transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in to set) Hello! I am Space Ghost. Welcome to my show. (waves) Joining us on this program will be motivational speaker and talk show host, Susan Powter, and comedian Kevin Meaney. Please say hello to the band, Zorak and the Original Way Outs!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Aaah! Sorry. (invisos to desk) Before we begin, I'd just like to point out to our viewers that although it may seem like the Ghost Planet behind me is really close, it's actually millions and millions of miles away. So, don't worry, we're not going to run into it or anything.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar! Damage report?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (as Star Trek's Scotty) She's breaking up!  She's gonna blow, Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (as the "Lost in Space" robot) Danger!  Danger!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Got... to do... something...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (as Ren) Space Ghost, you eediot!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (as Homer Simpson) D'oh!

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Aagh! Change it! Aagh! Aagh! This sucks!

transcript.speaker: Sisto
transcript.dialogue: (changes channel) Uh huh, uh huh huh, this is cool. Uh huh, uh huh huh.

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, heh heh heh, they're gonna die, heh heh, heh heh. Fire! Fire! (pause) Aagh! (changes channel again)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: My first guest is on a mission to stop the insanity, please welcome Susan Powter.

transcript.speaker: Susan Powter
transcript.dialogue: (to person off-camera) Yup... a little salt would be good. (stands up and walks off camera)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hello Susan.  Susan?  Moltar, what's she doing?

transcript.speaker: (Cut to control room. Monitor shows Susan getting out of her seat, with following text
Frequency
transcript.dialogue: Allocation:     23.3Distribution:   7....Modulation:     1.75Surplus Cheese: 4.5

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (in control room) She's eating pasta salad.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Perhaps she saw your face and decided to split, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, just remember who has the Orkin man on their speed dial!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh yeah?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Enough! Susan's back!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Susan, welcome to the show. I take much pleasure in knowing you.

transcript.speaker: Spanish Translator
transcript.dialogue: (with subtitles) Mucho gusto en conocerte.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Tell us, who are you really? What's your secret identity?

transcript.speaker: Susan Powter
transcript.dialogue: My secret identity? Um, well, I may as well, I may as well tell you here, sitting here with you, Space Ghost.  I'm really a transsexual, actually. I'm not a woman at all.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (blinks) Really?

transcript.speaker: Susan Powter
transcript.dialogue: The real identity is me. It's, uh, about as much me as you can get, when I'm up on the stage.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So, do you have any super powers that you use to stop the insanity?

transcript.speaker: Susan Powter
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, female intuition, the most powerful thing in the universe.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, right. You talk about women taking over the world.  Is this something that I'll be forced to stop in the near future?

transcript.speaker: Susan Powter
transcript.dialogue: (Laughs) Yeah, we're going to take over the world, so you're gonna have to battle us.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (slouch position, nodding) Susan, you have some food in your teeth...

transcript.speaker: Susan Powter
transcript.dialogue: (cleans her teeth with her finger)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's better.  You were born in Australia, have you ever been snatched away by a pack of wild dingoes? (wild dingo howling sound)

transcript.speaker: Susan Powter
transcript.dialogue: No, I, I, I escaped the bush narrowly. Narrowly escaped the bush.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I think we have some footage of you escaping the bush.  Roll that clip, Moltar!

transcript.speaker: Narrator
transcript.dialogue: People are afraid to leave their homes.  They cringe behind locked doors, trembling with fear!  Wondering who the deadly 'bush' will strike next! Meantime, the hideous creatures are multiplying fast!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: This actually isn't too bad. (clip ends)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: My, that's frightening. What do your arch enemies look like, Susan? What scares you?

transcript.speaker: Susan Powter
transcript.dialogue: Any freeze-dried yogurty, malty lookin' thing.  Anything white and creamy freeze-dried, stay away from it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes!  I certainly will. You must be in awe of my super colossal strength!

transcript.speaker: Susan Powter
transcript.dialogue: I'm in awe of any man that wears wristbands like yours.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Can you see every painful detail of my muscular physique?

transcript.speaker: Susan Powter
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) You are a specimen!  (laughs) In more ways than one.

transcript.speaker: Sisto
transcript.dialogue: She said 'specimen', huh, huh...

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, heh, heh... heh, heh. I'll get it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Thank you.  Say, I was thinking of coming out with my own diet plan, do you have any advice for me to follow?

transcript.speaker: Susan Powter
transcript.dialogue: Fly fast, and uh, whatever it is ya eat, make sure it's high volume, low fat. (laughs)  What do you eat, anyway?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Chemicals, tacos, fajitas, chimichangas, quesadillas, burritos, refried beans, flan, sopapillas, cheese dip, the speedy with beans, hot tamales...

transcript.speaker: Susan Powter
transcript.dialogue: Well, that's what we eat too.  Hey, it's the same thing.  We're all eating chemicals.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes, they help me do my job.

transcript.speaker: Susan Powter
transcript.dialogue: And what do you do?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I fly and save planets from peril.

transcript.speaker: Susan Powter
transcript.dialogue: Why doncha come on down and help us here, 'cause we're dying! (camera zooms in at end of sentence)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Will do, Citizen.  Thanks for being on the show, Susan, and good luck stopping the insanity.

transcript.speaker: Susan Powter
transcript.dialogue: Well, good luck saving the planets, and please help us here, 'cause we really do need your help.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay!  Don't go away, we'll be right back.
INTERRUPT FEED

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Alrighty!  My next guest is from Los Angeles, he is a stand up comedian, please welcome Kevin Meaney.

transcript.speaker: Kevin Meaney
transcript.dialogue: (to Zorak) What is wrong with you?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Does my music frighten you?

transcript.speaker: Kevin Meaney
transcript.dialogue: Yes!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (laughs, a la Beavis and Butthead)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm terribly sorry. Welcome Kevin, I trust the particle transformation was comfy, do you have enough oxygen?

transcript.speaker: Kevin Meaney
transcript.dialogue: Absolutely, Space Ghost, I couldn't be more comfortable, thank you for asking.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You're welcome.  Tell us, are you keeping busy?

transcript.speaker: Kevin Meaney
transcript.dialogue: I certainly am, uh, I travel all throughout the galaxy, uh, you know, doing my comedy.  (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Say Kevin, what would your mother think of you being on my show?

transcript.speaker: Kevin Meaney
transcript.dialogue: (imitating his mom) Oh my God, we turned on the TV this afternoon and guess who we saw?  Space Ghost!... Interviewing Kevin!  It was crazy!  I don't get it. Are you involved with the FBI or something?  Mmm-mm-mm!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Kevin, I have many super powers and a colossal bulk that frightens evil villains, what do you have that will impress us?

transcript.speaker: Kevin Meaney
transcript.dialogue: Well, Space Ghost, I have an incredible head of hair.

transcript.speaker: Spanish Translator
transcript.dialogue: (with subtitles) Tengo un peinado increible.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (not impressed) Astonishing. (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (Grits his teeth, aims a ray at Zorak)

transcript.speaker: Kevin Meaney
transcript.dialogue: Oh my God! Space Ghost!  Don't do that!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Ouch!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Already done!

transcript.speaker: Kevin Meaney
transcript.dialogue: I... think you've crossed the line here.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, whatever.

transcript.speaker: Kevin Meaney
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Kevin, I wear a pantsuit and a cape.

transcript.speaker: Spanish Translator
transcript.dialogue: (with subtitles) Me visto con ma yas y capa.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I wear a pantsuit and a cape. So what do you think of my tight pants?

transcript.speaker: Kevin Meaney
transcript.dialogue: Well, let me tell you something, Mr. Tight-Pants-wearing Space Ghost! (imitates his mother) I don't like them one bit!  Walking around the universe with tight pants on, it's not right!  You're like a crazy person!  What's wrong with you? What if President Kennedy finds out about this? He'll think the school has been infiltrated by Communist spies. And the Monsignor will be black-listed, and the Pope...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It's been a thrill having you on.  Come back and see us again. (:INTERRUPT FEED)

transcript.speaker: Kevin Meaney
transcript.dialogue: What do you mean, (:INTERRUPT FEED) you can't hear, I (:INTERRUPT FEED) Space Ghost.
INTERRUPT FEED

transcript.speaker: Male Announcer
transcript.dialogue: You've seen 'em outwit Space Ghost in horrendous space battles, now, hear 'em sing your favorite nursery rhymes and lullabies!  It's Zorak and Moltar! (picture of record album flies up on screen) Just listen...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (sings, sort of)Rock a bye Space GhostSay your prayers,My Locust ship is arrivingand I will conquer you!And the universe will beMINE! MINE! MINE! (evil laugh)

transcript.speaker: Male Announcer
transcript.dialogue: Like angels!  Never before has such evil villainous scum recorded such a masterpiece, one the whole family can enjoy!  Here's another favorite...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Twinkle, twinkle, little...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Star!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: We know exactly where you...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Are!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You can't run and you can't...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Hide!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Because we'll find you, Space Ghost, and the universe will be...

transcript.speaker: Zorak & Moltar
transcript.dialogue: OURS! OURS! OURS! (evil laugh)

transcript.speaker: Male Announcer
transcript.dialogue: Yes, just imagine... You'll be the envy of all your friends when you order this collector's item and play it really loud! Just send ninety-four dollars to the address on your screen.

transcript.speaker: Male Announcer
transcript.dialogue: (reading really fast) Zorak & Moltar sing the Nursery Rhymes and Favorite Lullabies, P.O. box one eight seven four eight seven six five one two two zero zero nine, space, the universe, six six eight zero zero zero one one two. Order now! That's right, only ninety-four dollars!

transcript.speaker: Female Announcer
transcript.dialogue: Available at Murray's.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (at desk, watching commercial) Hmmmmm.  That's expensive.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: How could this be? There's three of them!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar!  What is it?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It's the blasted Bee Gees! (more satellite data is displayed on the monitor)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What?  How can this be?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: They say you called them to be on the show!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Why, I never called... Zorak!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Uh, I must go to the store to get butter and cheese.

transcript.speaker: Spanish Translator
transcript.dialogue: (with subtitles) Tengo que ir a la tienda a comprar mantequilla y queso.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I must go to the store to get butter and cheese.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Standby, Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hello, Bee Ghees, are you in good spirits?

transcript.speaker: Bee Gees
transcript.dialogue: It depends on what we've been eating, Space Ghost, it depends on the food. Come on, Space Ghost, come on! (they all talk & laugh continuously)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (to himself) This is the Bee Gees, boy, if only we could really, just, fry them.

transcript.speaker: Bee Gees
transcript.dialogue: (continue to laugh)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (zaps the Bee Gees) Hey fellas, I know a great Polynesian restaurant up the street.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I could go for a pu pu platter.
